tourBios.carHigh:
Played on the eGolf Tour from 2006-09, making the cut in 40 of 57 starts and posting 14 top-10 finishes. 2012: Finished T114 at the PGA TOUR Qualifying Tournament to earn conditional status on the Web.com Tour for 2013...Played in 18 events on the eGolf Tour, making 10 cuts. Best effort on the eGolf Tour was a T4 at the Grand Harbor Open. Shot 63 in the opening round at Patriot GC.2010: Made the cut in seven of 27 starts on Tour with a T17 at the Preferred Health Systems Wichita Open his only top-25 finish during the year. 

2008: Made his first career PGA TOUR startâa missed cut at the Wyndham Championship. Made one of two cuts on the Web.com Tour, finishing T44 at the Rex Hospital Open. 

2006: Won the Raintree Classic on the eGolf Tour.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Honorable mention All-American and All-Atlantic Coast Conference selection. Attended Spartanburg (S.C.) High School, where he was an all-conference and all-region selection all four years and all-state twice...Won the 2006 U.S. Collegiate Championship.
tourBios.personal: Biggest thrill in golf was playing in the 2008 Wyndham Championship...Never travels without his Chapstick. First car was a 1987 Ford Bronco. Now drives a GMC Yukon...Favorite college team is the Clemson Tigers...Other favorites include chicken casserole, Brett Favre and Maui, Hawaii...Dream foursome would include his father, Jack Nicklaus and Ben Hogan...Twitter account is @stephenpoolejr...Favorite professional teams include the Atlanta Braves and the Carolina Panthers...Eats at Chick-Fil-A quite a bit...Dream foursome would include his dad, Jack Nicklaus and Ben Hogan...Favorite quote is "Live To Fight Another Day"...Bucket List items include traveling to Europe and sky diving...Lists Augusta National as his favorite golf course.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T17th in 2010 at the Preferred Health Systems Wichita Open.
